name: ZooSounds
0:
”Alexa open Zoo Sounds”
”Alexa ask Zoo Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zoo sounds
des:
Bring the excitement of the zoo into your home with a variety of animal sounds. This skill features the calls of lions, elephants, monkeys, and more, providing an auditory adventure for animal lovers.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Zoo Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
